meanings: one's biological[real] older brother, one's older brother (by blood)

Elder guy who goes to church. This word describes a guy who seems like he goes to church (doesn't have to but have to look as he does), pretty smart, gentle, decent looking, and has manner as well. Able to play guitar is essential for 교회오빠.
